document.topic_text: INDEX Riau Boat Accident i Families looking for the bodies of their relatives in Tanjung Pinang hospital, Tanjung Pinang, Riau Islands, on Sunday (21/08) after the boat carrying 17 passengers from Tanjung Pinang to Penyengat Island, sank in bad weather. (Antara Photo/Yuli Seperi) By : Jakarta Globe | on 2:26 PM August 22, 2016 Families looking for the bodies of their relatives in a hospital , Tanjung Pinang, Riau Islands, on Sunday (21/08) after the boat carrying 17 passengers from Tanjung Pinang to Penyengat Island, sank in bad weather. (Antara Photo/Yuli Seperi)
